p: For frass samples, three critical points must be considered: (a) the paucity of insect DNA in these samples; (b) the presence of amplification inhibitors deriving from frass (Mitchell and Hanks 2009; Schrader et al. 2012; Strangi et al. 2013; Nagarajan et al. 2020; Rizzo et al. 2020a, b); and (c) the possibility DNA degradation over time or as an effect of frass exposition to environmental factors.
